title: Live updates: Wagner’s Yevgeniy Prigozhin believed to be aboard crashed plane in Russia
description: At least 10 people died in the crash of a Wagner-linked plane, according to emergency services. Yevgeniy Prighozin was on the manifest, a state-run news agency reported. Follow for live updates.

title: Putin and Xi face hurdles in bid to turn BRICS into anti-Western bloc
description: The planned expansion of the group was touted by China as a watershed moment, but the summit also highlighted Russian President Vladimir Putin’s global isolation.

title: ‘General Armageddon’ replaced in Russia, reports state media
description: Speculation swirled about the general, as he has not been seen since he urged Wagner mercenary boss Yevgeniy Prigozhin to stop his fighters marching on Moscow.

title: 50 years ago, a bizarre bank heist spawned ‘Stockholm syndrome’
description: In 1973, during a standoff with police that shocked and captivated Sweden, a surprising bond formed between bank robber Jan-Erik Olsson and his hostages.

title: Man flees China on water scooter, crossing 200 miles of ocean to S. Korea
description: A human rights activist identified the man who washed up on South Korea’s coastal flats as Kwon Pyong, who had previously been jailed in China.

title: As Niger’s crisis drags on, its West African neighbors are tested
description: Led by Nigeria’s Bola Tinubu, the bloc has taken an assertive stance.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Putin tries to curry favor at BRICS economic summit; U.S. defends Ukraine’s performance
description: Russia, which drew international criticism for pulling out of the Black Sea grain deal, claimed at the summit that it could fill Ukraine’s role as a grain supplier.

title: Nazis massacred his Ukrainian village in World War II. He fears Russia now.
description: Fedir Bovkun was 6 years old when German invaders nearly wiped out his Ukrainian village. Now, he worries about being attacked by invading Russians.

title: On Ukraine, Republicans grapple with real political divisions
description: The war in Ukraine offers a rare snapshot of genuine ideological divergence within the Republican party.
